mapper.insert:
insert into sms_home_recommend_product (product_id, product_name, recommend_status, sort) values
(#{item.productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recommendStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into sms_home_recommend_product
id,
product_id, product_name, recommend_status, sort,
values
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommendStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
on duplicate key update
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend_status = #{recommendStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
